parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: List of rule IDs to be deleted.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: Specify the language of the user information to be deleted. Values: -**zh**: Chinese. -**en**: English.

parameters.name: ServiceCode
parameters.description: ServiceCode for the real-person cloud product, only takes the value: **antcloudauth**.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: Set the source IP address of the visitor. Supports IP addresses in CIDR and IPv4 formats. Example: 10.0.3.0/24.
